name: places/ChIJzRXA-cNYwokRAKA6Jfyy15c
formattedAddress: 519 E 72nd St #204, New York, NY 10021, USA
adrFormatAddress: 519 E 72nd St #204, New York, NY 10021, USA

originalText.text:
Dr Rozbruch is a wonderful surgeon and very kind
He fixed my ankle from 1978 about 12 years ago, it originally was shattered and after 30 yrs I was told it would have to be fused. Another Dr referred me for reconstructive surgery it changed my life and I was pain free. Unfortunately this past year I had an accident and had to get another surgery on the ankle and leg I-was n Ct. after healing 2 surgeries later I recently went to see him to see what my options would be if something were to happen again. He took the time reviewed X-rays etc and gave me some peace of mind
I would and have recommended him to many people.

originalText.text:
I've seen four doctors 'down south' for foot pain. The 4th finally took an x-ray of my ankle, said it was worn out and fusion my only option. I just couldn't accept fusion. The loss of flexibility distressed me. I started researching on the internet and read an article on ankle distraction surgery co-authored by Dr.
Robert Rozbruch. It's regrows ankle cartilage. Beyond amazing!!! I'm not a great candidate for that but he said I AM a good candidate for ankle replacement. He has fantastic technology that customizes the hardware for my body. I've been pain in every step for three years. He assures me that I will be walking normally and pain free with ankle replacement. It's the ankle under a fantastic new knee replacement. Tonight I feel I'm in a miracle. Dr. Rozbruch took awhile to get to me but was 200 % attentive and did the most thorough examination. Not being able to walk has been hell.

UPDATE: Nine weeks status post total ankle replacement by Dr. Robert Rozbruch.

MY FOOT DOES NOT HURT!!!!!!!!!!!

originalText.text:
Scheduling staff, specifically Rosa, has been very difficult to work with. Very impatient and vindictive.
I had to cancel a couple appointments. She wanted to get me in for a virtual visit and pay $400 without even having any medical records on file the first time. The second time I had a scheduling conflict.
Pity because I hear good things about the doctor but the staff seems to be arrogant and unempathetic.

originalText.text:
We've always had such amazing experiences with Dr Rozbruch and his team. I am thankful for the opportunity to share an excellent review.
I am about to have my third set of procedures here, and everyone in the office is so kind and caring.  His staff has been with him for a very long time, and it's always nice to see their familiar faces.
A leader in his field, Dr Rozbruch is competent, thoughtful, professional and proactive.
I've recently learned that he can help with my future medical needs - I can't say how happy this made me.  He goes above and beyond, and is really like no other physician I've ever encountered (and I've had to meet with many, many doctors).
I'm so thrilled to be in his care again, to know that he and his team will once again be enabling me to live a pain-free and happy life!
Not only is he highly skilled and changing lives for the better every day, he has a very friendly manner, that instantly makes you feel comfortable about things like getting your leg surgically broken and lengthened - amazing!!
I cannot recommend Dr Rozbruch more highly.  If you are reading this because you're in need, call him and go meet him.  Chances are, he can help you. He's awesome!!

originalText.text:
Dr Rozbruch gave me the ability to live again - pain free and the same height I was in
1972; he is amazing.
I am a 66 year old woman and have been suffering with leg/foot problems for the past
42 years.  My left ankle was removed due to infection and fused, this solved one
problem but led to years of other issues with countless doctors and a dozen surgeries.
In 2012 I had a knee replacement, again this solved the problem of knee pain but now my knee and foot were out of alignment,  I was told this was the best that could be done; I was in a great deal of pain and at my "wits" end.  I went on line and found  Dr Rozbruch, I called and just talking to his staff made me feel better; I got an appointment and liked Dr Rozbruch immediately.  In all my years of treatment I had never spent so much time with a doctor; he was kind, thoughtful and confident.
He listened to me, then he said he could fix my problem and get rid of the pain;
he could also lengthen my leg the two inches I had lost 40 years earlier.
I could no believe my ears, the ability to walk straight, to have my hips even, to not
feel deformed, no more lifts on my shoes or hemming one leg of my pants - it was
too good to be true.

I am old and this doctor is going to change my life after I have been told for years there was nothing that could be done - it was a miracle.
Well, Dr Rozbruch is "a miracle worker" everything he promised, he did - I can walk
without pain, I have no cloths issues, I feel so much better about myself because
Dr Rozbruch is such a wonderful doctor.  From the moment I met Dr Rozbruch he
filled me with his confidence and I never had a moments thought of anything but
success.

Thank you to Dr Rozbruch, his staff and HSS, I am so grateful I had the opportunity
to be a recipient of this life changing organization.

With endless appreciation to Dr Rozbruch,

Theresa Poysden - South Carolina
